module.short: lists files inside a directory. The output can be customized in various ways from style via css to excluding certain entries.

entry.name: css
entry.short: string: url to external stylesheet (default: inline internal css)

entry.name: hide-dotfiles
entry.short: boolean: hide entries beginning with a dot (default: true)

entry.name: hide-tildefiles
entry.short: boolean: hide entries ending with a tilde (~), often used for backups (default: true)

entry.name: hide-directories
entry.short: boolean: hide directories from the directory listing (default: false)

entry.name: include-header
entry.short: boolean: include HEADER.txt above the directory listing (default: false)

entry.name: hide-header
entry.short: boolean: hide HEADER.txt from the directory listing (default: false)

entry.name: encode-header
entry.short: boolean: html-encode HEADER.txt (if included), set to false if it contains real HTML (default: true)

entry.name: include-readme
entry.short: boolean: include README.txt below the directory listing (default: true)

entry.name: hide-readme
entry.short: boolean: hide README.txt from the directory listing (default: false)

entry.name: encode-readme
entry.short: boolean: html-encode README.txt (if included), set to false if it contains real HTML (default: true)

entry.name: exclude-suffix
entry.short: list of strings: hide entries that end with one of the strings supplied (default: empty list)

entry.name: exclude-prefix
entry.short: list of strings: hide entries that begin with one of the strings supplied (default: empty list)

entry.name: debug
entry.short: boolean: output debug information to log (default: false)

entry.name: content-type
entry.short: string: content-type to return in HTTP response headers (default: "text/html; charset=utf-8")

example.description: shows a directory listing including the content of HEADER.txt above the list and hiding itself from it; also hides all files ending in ".bak"
